plot: Magnus' grief consumes him whilst Ava - his girlfriend cum nurse - is tiring of the drudgery. Along with Aubrey, an old friend, Ava seeks to bring Magnus back to life.
title: Toy Soldier
plot_es: Magnus' grief consumes him whilst Ava - his girlfriend cum nurse - is tiring of the drudgery. Along with Aubrey, an old friend, Ava seeks to bring Magnus back to life.
